home.sub_title: Technologist in Big Data in Agribusiness
home.description:
Hello, welcome to my website! My name is Lucas de Brito Silva, and at 24, I embark on an exciting journey in the field of Technology. Since 2021, I made a transition from the area of systems and application development to the fascinating world of data. Currently, I am a Machine Learning Engineer at Agibank.

My journey includes training in the Computer Technician course at ETEC Professor Massuyuki Kawano and pioneering in the first class to graduate in Big Data in Agribusiness, at FATEC Shunji Nishimura. Additionally, I've done a master's degree in Computer Science at São Paulo State University "Júlio de Mesquita Filho" (UNESP).

My interests and passions lie in the areas of data, computational intelligence, deep learning, computer vision, and machine learning engineering. I hope you enjoy your visit to my website.
subtitles: Technologist in Big Data in Agribusiness

publi.title: Publications
publi.description: I enjoy writing to contribute to the community and enhance my knowledge. My topics usually revolve around science and digital technologies. Feel free to read my blog posts on Medium or Dev Community, or explore my scientific publications on Google Scholar or ResearchGate.

modal-off.title: You are offline!

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.information_collection_text: This website does not collect any personal data from users. The only information processed is the user's IP address, which is checked with a third-party service solely to adapt the website's language settings (English or Portuguese) based on location. This is done via cookies for a seamless user experience.
privacy_policy.use_of_information_text: The information gathered is limited to language preferences, enabling a customized experience for users by displaying content in their preferred language.
privacy_policy.data_sharing_text: No personal data of users is collected or shared with third parties. The IP address is briefly processed by a third-party language adaptation service, but it is not stored by this website.
privacy_policy.data_security_text: As no personal data is collected, data security measures apply only to ensure safe integration with third-party services and protect website functionality.
privacy_policy.user_rights_text: Users can adjust their cookie settings to control language preference storage. Since no personal data is stored, there are no additional data rights applicable.
privacy_policy.changes_to_policy_text: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically, especially if there are changes to the third-party services we use.
privacy_policy.contact_information_text: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us.
privacy_policy.additional_text: The detailed information regarding our privacy practices is provided below.
